trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Danville
There were no other sightings in Danville on or around September 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw a sphere in the sky, asumed it was a balloon, watched for 5min got my binoculars watched for 10 min laying on the ground to be stationary no drift no movement got my camera took two photos continued to watch for approximately 40 min with o movement then it divided into 4 spherical parts in a non semetrical x pattern approximately 20 times the original size and disappeared with a small amount of smoke or condensation
Summary: metallic sphere stationary for approximately for an hour and divided into four.
